original_title: CBeebies Christmas Panto: Dick Whittington and His Cat
overview: Sing, dance and laugh along as a host of CBeebies stars take to the stage with a fun filled Christmas pantomime written especially for pre-school children and their families.  Four performances will be filmed in front of a live audience before airing on CBeebies and BBC iPlayer at a later date.
title: CBeebies Christmas Panto: Dick Whittington and His Cat
